title: Error
body: Ok Riot...... IDK whats up with your low priority queue.......but i have 10 mins to wait in the low queue......in that 10 mins countdown when it reaches 5 mins......it literally adds on an extra 5 mins without leaving the queue.......i wait another 5 mins and it adds on again......i wait the 15 mins and it adds on another 5 mins.....i really enjoy this game but it is literally discouraging me from playing the game..... please fix the problem

replies.body: It sounds like whatever caused your initial [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is still lingering, likely a connection issue causing you to lose sync.  You may want to stick to customs for now and run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and stay connected.  I hope that helps!
